title: TR-8R is the true hero of Force Awakens
body:
http://imgur.com/qjV5TzK
He taught us that loyalty and sick spins are all a man needs to look like a badass. He's the best character in the movie and deserves credit for his role, maybe even an award.
http://imgur.com/QrIlvGh
http://imgur.com/aQcPdka
http://imgur.com/KIBDqIg
